Question: Himiway E-bike CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Himiway

Product 1

C1 Kids E-Bike

- 300W Motor
- 36V 15Ah battery
- 15 mph top speed
- Three riding modes
- Available in four colors
- Suitable for children aged 4-12
- Safety features include hydraulic and electronic braking systems

Product 2

C3 Cargo E-Bike

- 48V 20Ah battery
- 750W Hub motor
- 80-mile range
- Hydraulic disc brakes
- 350 lb weight capacity
- Optional extended seat and pegs for carrying passengers

Product 3

D7 Pro Electric MTB

- 48V 20Ah battery
- M620 1,000W mid-drive motor
- 28 mph top speed
- 26x4.8 CST tires
- Inverted front fork and rear suspension

Product 4

C5 Electric Motorbike

- 48V 20Ah battery
- 750W motor
- 80-mile range
- 300 lb weight capacity
- Motorcycle-style frame
- Dual suspension system
- Hydraulic brakes
- Customizable lighting and accessories
Summary_cn:
Himiway

产品1

C1儿童电动自行车

- 300W电机
- 36V 15Ah电池
- 最高时速15英里
- 三种骑行模式
- 有四种颜色可选
- 适合4-12岁的儿童使用
- 安全功能包括液压和电子制动系统

产品2

C3货运电动自行车

- 48V 20Ah电池
- 750W轮毂电机
- 80英里续航里程
- 液压碟刹
- 承重350磅
- 可选的扩展座椅和脚踏板，用于搭载乘客

产品3

D7 Pro电动山地自行车

- 48V 20Ah电池
- M620 1,000W中置电机
- 时速28英里
- 26x4.8 CST轮胎
- 倒置式前叉和后减震装置

产品4

C5电动摩托车

- 48V 20Ah电池
- 750W电机
- 80英里续航里程
- 承重300磅
- 摩托车式车架
- 双减震系统
- 液压刹车
- 可定制的灯光和配件
